snippet.title: HEVN Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
HEVN, a first-person sci-fi adventure game, to be released for PC through Steam this September 7th.

https://www.hevngame.com/
https://www.instagram.com/gamesfrommiga/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/588800/HEVN/

In 2128, the world's population is hoping for a better future. With the help of new technologies dependent on a rare and hazardous off-world element, Earth narrowly avoids total collapse.... for a price.

With no options left, Sebastian Mar joins a dangerous celestial mining mission light years away. As an employee of Nomoni Incorporated, you'll navigate the physical and political dangers of a controversial mission, uncovering deeper secrets best left buried light-years from Earth.
